channel.title: Apple Tv on Ji Molloy
channel.description: Recent content in Apple Tv on Ji Molloy

item.title: Comparing Severance TV Show to Virtualisation Techniques 🧠💻
item.description:
If you’ve ever watched Severance on Apple TV, you know that it’s a very interesting and addictive show that explores the concept of “severance” — a procedure that separates your work-life memories from your personal memories 🧑‍💼💼

But have you ever thought about how Severance could be compared to virtualisation techniques? 🤔 Let’s do an interesting comparison between the human mind and computer systems together, using concepts like partitioning and virtualisation 🚀
